title: Teen in critical condition after being shot in the face in Southwest Fresno
content:
FRESNO, Calif. (KFSN) --
Fresno police are investigating a shooting that left a teenager shot in the face.
Officers say a 17-year-old boy got into an argument with another man at the Autozone Store on California and Lee in Southwest Fresno.
That suspect pulled out a gun and fired at the victim's jaw.
Paramedics found the teen a few blocks away at his house and he is now in critical condition.
Police said the suspect ran away.
